mn102:17.2.pli: ‘etaṁ santaṁ etaṁ paṇītaṁ yadidaṁ pavivekaṁ pītiṁ upasampajja viharāmī’ti.
mn102:17.2.en: ‘This is peaceful, this is sublime, that is, entering and remaining in the rapture of seclusion.’

mn102:18.5.pli: ‘etaṁ santaṁ etaṁ paṇītaṁ yadidaṁ pavivekaṁ pītiṁ upasampajja viharāmī’ti.
mn102:18.5.en: ‘This is peaceful, this is sublime, that is, entering and remaining in the rapture of seclusion.’

mn102:19.2.pli: ‘etaṁ santaṁ etaṁ paṇītaṁ yadidaṁ nirāmisaṁ sukhaṁ upasampajja viharāmī’ti.
mn102:19.2.en: ‘This is peaceful, this is sublime, that is, entering and remaining in pleasure not of the flesh.’

mn102:20.5.pli: ‘etaṁ santaṁ etaṁ paṇītaṁ yadidaṁ nirāmisaṁ sukhaṁ upasampajja viharāmī’ti.
mn102:20.5.en: ‘This is peaceful, this is sublime, that is, entering and remaining in pleasure not of the flesh.’

mn102:21.2.pli: ‘etaṁ santaṁ etaṁ paṇītaṁ yadidaṁ adukkhamasukhaṁ vedanaṁ upasampajja viharāmī’ti.
mn102:21.2.en: ‘This is peaceful, this is sublime, that is, entering and remaining in neutral feeling.’

mn102:22.5.pli: ‘etaṁ santaṁ etaṁ paṇītaṁ yadidaṁ adukkhamasukhaṁ vedanaṁ upasampajja viharāmī’ti.
mn102:22.5.en: ‘This is peaceful, this is sublime, that is, entering and remaining in neutral feeling.’

an9.36:2.7.pli: ‘etaṁ santaṁ etaṁ paṇītaṁ yadidaṁ sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhākkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānan’ti.
an9.36:2.7.en: ‘This is peaceful; this is sublime—that is, the stilling of all activities, the letting go of all attachments, the ending of craving, fading away, cessation, extinguishment.’

an9.36:3.6.pli: ‘etaṁ santaṁ etaṁ paṇītaṁ yadidaṁ sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhākkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānan’ti.

mlDocs.author: Bhikkhu Sujato

an10.99:35.1.pli: Sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘santametaṁ paṇītametan’ti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an10.99:35.1.en: “Going totally beyond the dimension of nothingness, aware that ‘this is peaceful, this is sublime’, they enter and remain in the dimension of neither perception nor non-perception.

mlDocs.title:
Numbered Discourses 10.99
10. With Upāli
With Upāli

dn1:3.16.4.pli: Atthi kho, bho, añño attā sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma “santametaṁ paṇītametan”ti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanūpago.
dn1:3.16.4.en: There is another self that has gone totally beyond the dimension of nothingness. Aware that “this is peaceful, this is sublime”, it’s been reborn in the dimension of neither perception nor non-perception.
